title.rendered: The Women Contractors of Sweeten, Part 2

content.rendered:
Support women who own and operate their own general contracting firms with us

For Women’s History month, we are spotlighting women general contractors who are in our network. They are leading the way while closing the gender gap. With solid work portfolios, their firms have completed a wide range of projects—from single-room remodels to full-home renovations and additions. This post, the second in a five-part series, profiles some of the most talented Sweeten general contractors across our various cities.

Sweeten General Contractor Leah | New York City

General contractor Leah has owned and operated her contracting business in NYC for almost 15 years, with experience in different points of the process. Her company completes a wide range of construction activities, from pre-development to turnover. Serving both the public and private sector, Leah has worked on projects ranging in scope and skillsets—from a condo fitness center and Victorian home restoration to a modern high-rise apartment. Each of her projects gets assigned a dedicated project manager to ensure it is completed on time and on budget. See more of Leah’s remodeling work and reviews on our website.

Sweeten General Contractor Ishita | Long Island, NY

Ishita’s main focus is customer service. It’s a point of pride not to use “pushy sales tactics or upselling” to retain clients. Instead, she prefers to let the work speak for itself. Ishita’s general contracting firm handles all different types of renovations in Suffolk County, New York, located on Long Island. For example, she has completed single-room makeovers as well as large estate renovations. The general contractor also plans, manages, and builds multi-phase jobs. Above all, Ishita remains focused on the overall experience. “It really is about how our customers feel at the end [that matters].” See Sweeten contractor Ishita’s reviews and work.

Sweeten General Contractor Natylee | New York City

Natylee is a Sweeten general contractor with her partner, Lem, servicing New York City and surrounding areas. Natylee’s firm specializes in residential home remodels and is very detail oriented. Therefore, it ensures every project gets the attention it deserves. Sweeten homeowner Catherine A. said, “I had an excellent experience with this team. They were very patient and thorough, from our first meeting and the extremely detailed estimate to the design and build process.” The contractor has completed 32 Sweeten renovations. Jen’s kitchen makeover (top) and Lauren’s Brooklyn kitchen renovation (bottom) have both been featured on our blog. Find out more about Natylee’s work and reviews on our site.

Sweeten General Contractor Nancy | Fairfield County, CT

Sweeten contractor, Nancy, and her partner, John, have over 24 years of experience working in the Fairfield County, Connecticut area. They aim to provide the homeowner the best experience and with quality materials. Similarly, offering reliable service and building relationships are important to them. The list of services includes single home renovations, general carpentry, and flooring. Nancy’s firm has completed four Sweeten renovations, including Samantha and Justin’s garage remodel (above), which was featured on our blog. Read reviews and see more of contractor Nancy’s work.

Sweeten General Contractor Jessica | Los Angeles, CA

Running a family-owned business, Jessica, and her partner, Michael, cite their amazing designs and workmanship as ways that make them stand out. Serving Los Angeles, CA, they specialize in all aspects of residential remodeling. Jessica promises to provide each homeowner with quality materials, construction, and design services. The partners guarantee 100% satisfaction. As a result, the firm has earned an overall 5-star review from past clients. Jessica joined our network in 2020 and has completed four Sweeten projects. Read reviews and see more of contractor Jessica’s work.

Connect with a Sweeten Contractor

—

Read The Women General Contractors of Sweeten, Part 1, Part 3, Part 4, and Part 5. 

Sweeten handpicks the best general contractors to match each project’s location, budget, and scope, helping until project completion. Follow the blog, Sweeten Stories, for renovation ideas and inspiration and when you’re ready to renovate, start your renovation on Sweeten.
